snippet: The pianist played his “Variations on a Theme by Paganini” at the Peoples’ Symphony concert on Saturday.
abstract: David Allen reviews performance by pianist Marc-Andre Hamelin at Washington Irving High School as part of Peoples' Symphony series.
lead_paragraph: The pianist played his “Variations on a Theme by Paganini” at the Peoples’ Symphony concert on Saturday.

headline.main: Marc-André Hamelin Performs Variations on Paganini
headline.print_headline: Variations on Paganini  to Challenge Many Others
